commit message: Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/jberkel/Anki-Android
Partial Portuguese support
Removed unneeded Strings

Changed deck_preferences and flashcard_portrait for internationalization
Continue Portuguese support
French localization, I didnt test it though
Internationalization preferences.xml, and portuguese translations
More internationalization
End of code i18n and Portuguese translation
More work on i18n: deleted PreferenceCategory on deck_preferences.xml (it was redundant), extracted strings from AndroidManifest.xml, internationalized About and included Catalan language.
i18n for Catalan.
i18n for Spanish and some fixes on the translations for Catalan.
Review Early Feature
tool to copy translations from Crowdin to the code. Not finished yet, needs to insert 0,1,2,3,4,5 missing values
removed unneeded file
Renamed Util.java to Utils.java.
Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/nicolas-raoul/Anki-Android
Updated all references of Ankidroid to AnkiDroid (including the name of classes)
Renamed Ankidroid to AnkiDroid too, it would not compile on my Linux otherwise
Made AnkiDroid independent of the external storage available.
Started Get Shared Decks functionality.
Created AnkiDroidProxy.java and SharedDeck.java and implemented methods to get the list of shared decks and download one of them.

Added Connection class, that will be responsible for making asynchronous connections. Also thrown Exceptions instead of catching them on AnkiDroidProxy, because it will be Connection the one dealing with them.
Added listener for getting shared deck on AnkiDroid.java and created SharedDeckPicker.java
Show available shared decks on a list in SharedDeckPicker.java.
Added different alerts with informative messages for the users in case there is some kind of error: no connection, error with the connection...

Fixed some bugs related to the external storage initialization and the building of the path where the shared deck had to be downloaded. Now, downloading shared decks already work but there are still some details to work on.
Made the list of available shared decks look like the deck picker list and load the selected deck after it is downloaded.
Internationalized the strings used on the Get Shared Decks funcionality.

Finished Get Shared Decks functionality: Implemented methods and workflow to update all cards in a deck and update all cards of the downloaded shared deck after loading it (because if that is not done, both the question and the answer of every card will be empty)

Added several new preferences to have more question/answer display options:
* Only parse for ruby annotations if wanted
* Choose between relative font size and absolute font size
* Possibility to show the question again, when the answer is shown
* Made categories in preferences to give better guidance
Merged the improvements on Preferences made by Rick and my code for Get Shared Decks.
Merged with master, hich contained Edu's synch changes. Optimized dynamic font size a bit.
Merged the simultaneous merge performed slightly differently by both edu and vanosten
Rearranged drawing of questions and answers plus added span around questions and answers.
Updated Preferences with sync options.
Major change to Model, CardModel and AnkiDroid to read model data and to enable use of font colors in question and answer plus card background. the colors are right now hardcoded -> FIXME
Font colours (in question/answer) and background colours now activated
Enabled font size based on deck properties
Delete of unnecessary fields in Model plus fixed getting Model all the time due to little bug
Small bug fix to prevent reloading
Removed optimisation for inactive CardModels. Not worth the trouble space wise.
Implemented lazy loading of Models instea of static currentCard
Corrected missing hexify of fieldmodel id
Changed preferences for showing question in answer from boolean to list
Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/vanosten/Anki-Android
Changed font size behavior to include font family and font size is now calculated absolutely from CardModel/FieldModel sizes with a general display size factor in preferences.
Fixed little bug that made the app crash when the currentCard was null.
Corrected bug when displaying no card and hide 'Show question' when question is shown
Small code fix to prevent card update when card edit is cancelled
AnkiDroid Widget by Travis Watt, see http://code.google.com/p/ankidroid/issues/detail?id=94 Thanks Travisgit status
Added IntelliJ ignores
Fix CRLF
Custom Exception Handler
Links to license and source in the About dialog
Merged Rick's font and display-related changes

A Hong Kong-based company called Goapk.com contributed a Simplified Chinese translation, and kindly asked if we could mention them, so I created a contributors wiki page and linked to it from the About dialog.
Copied Italian, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese translations from Crowdin.com
oops I committed the wrong files yesterday, here are the Simplified Chinese translations

Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/t123/Anki-Android
Delete all files on button press, not only ok

AnkiDroidWidget.java:
Reload the deck if there was a deck open.

Deck.java:
Store the filename and path of the current deck, as well as a getter/setter for it.
Raise notification improvement.
Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/t123/Anki-Android

Code and resource housekeeping to remove Eclipse errors and warnings.

XML files modified to escape ' characters with slashes where necessary.

AnkiDroid.java modified to comment out unused final field and to add warning
suppression to to-be-used field updateNotifications.

AnkiDroidApp.java modified to remove unused includes.

AnkiDroidWidget.java modified to add warning suppression to unused
mockFetchDeckInformation function (is that for testing?).

Card.java updated to add warning suppression to cardModel field, which is
private but never read locally.

CustomExceptionHandler.java modified to comment out randomGenerator, which
is unused, and unused imports.

Deck.java modified to suppress warnings for unused initUndo function.

ErrorReporter.java modified to remove unused imports.

SharedDeck.java modified to suppress serial warnings.

Utils.java modified to parameterize listToJSONArray argument.
Updated congratulations message: Shared decks don't need to be downloaded with Anki anymore
sdk-location has been renamed to sdk.dir
Send reports to anki-android googlegroups instead of sample example.org
Created a special group for bug reports, so that the normal group does not get crazy traffic in case of frequent bug reports
Copied translations from Crowdin, fixed some. Python script to make it a bit faster
Added German, Romanian, Swedish
Fixed error report email, mailing list would be better but seems to cause problems, this address will redirect to the ankidroid-bugs mailing list
Added closeDeck in onPause
Improved check for updating deck in Deck.openDeck()
Escapes for apostrophes
Fixed some errors on res/values-fr/strings.xml and res/values-pt/strings.xml, where various apostrophes were not properly escaped.
Bug fix for issue #131: Now, when a shared deck is downloaded is stored on the deck location defined by the user on preferences.
fixed some translations
Added Switch Deck button next to Review Early button
Merge branch 'master' of http://github.com/nicolas-raoul/Anki-Android
syncing to main

Bug fix for issue #131: Now, when a shared deck is downloaded is stored on the deck location defined by the user on preferences.
